I called Matthew at ITMZ to help me with old and new laptop issues a few times and I am so glad I found him. He is a competent, patient, and fair IT professional. He is responsive and was able to come to my house within a day or two every time I needed him. Matt was always kind, professional and very knowledgeable. He was patient and answered all my questions. He figured out some thorny security issues on my old PC, and provided good advice for how to avoid them in the future. He also set up a new MAC laptop, transferred all files and applications, and provided mentoring so that I was able to quickly learn the differences between the two operating systems. Matt is great!. His prices are very fair. I recommend him highly for any technical issues you may have.
